channel.title: Comments on: A Stranger in a Strange Land

item.title: By: pagey
item.dc:creator: pagey
item.description:
i understand why your trying eq2.
im a long time mmorpg - er? er.
all i can say is that from my experience with eq2 and wow is that both games are suffering from something. n00bitis.
I also recently went back to norrath (havent been there since 2201 when i discovered dereth). LFG - Troubadour looking for good old fashoined style xp group! Yeah jo1n us. ok cool what we hunting ? giants in TS sweet join group consisting of warlock - assasin x2, swashbuckler x2. hmm
ok guys this may* work.
1 and a half painful hours later i log out and decide its not the games that have changed but the kids that are now playing them.
*will definetly not
Tully wow euro hellscream
item.content:encoded:
i understand why your trying eq2.

im a long time mmorpg – er? er.

all i can say is that from my experience with eq2 and wow is that both games are suffering from something. n00bitis.

I also recently went back to norrath (havent been there since 2201 when i discovered dereth). LFG – Troubadour looking for good old fashoined style xp group!
Yeah jo1n us.
ok cool what we hunting ?
giants in TS
sweet
join group consisting of warlock – assasin x2, swashbuckler x2. hmm

ok guys this may* work.

1 and a half painful hours later i log out and decide its not the games that have changed but the kids that are now playing them.

*will definetly not

Tully wow euro hellscream

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
I can't go back to EQ! I only have level 65s. Imagine the shame! I was just checking the trial for EQ2.
Emphasizing ... I was just checking, having a look around, trying out a few things.
item.content:encoded:
I can’t go back to EQ! I only have level 65s. Imagine the shame! I was just checking the trial for EQ2.

Emphasizing … I was just checking, having a look around, trying out a few things.

item.title: By: Abalieno
item.dc:creator: Abalieno
item.description:
But you didn't go back to EQ?
Is that EQ or EQ2?
item.content:encoded:
But you didn’t go back to EQ?

Is that EQ or EQ2?

item.title: By: Aggro Me
item.dc:creator: Aggro Me
item.content:encoded:
“I’ve been down this road before. It always starts out like this. A joke, a taunt, a throwaway idea. Next thing I know, I’m back on duty in Norrath.”

And now, the prophecy is complete. Don’t try to fight it.

I can’t wait to read some updates from Norrath. You know, just for the “trial” of course.

item.title: By: Ethic
item.dc:creator: Ethic
item.description: Hmm, my comment got messed up. Oh well, I was just saying how much I liked that song and now I have to go dig the CD out of the basement, thanks.
item.content:encoded: Hmm, my comment got messed up. Oh well, I was just saying how much I liked that song and now I have to go dig the CD out of the basement, thanks.

item.title: By: Gimme A Dollar
item.dc:creator: Gimme A Dollar
item.description:
EQ2 has kept me entertained for the last couple of months. Being a hardcore EQ player back in the day(starting in December 1999), I was rather shocked at how much easier EQ2 was over EQ.
I hope you enjoy your time in EQ2land. If not, I hope you rip EQ2 to hell and gone so I can read about it and nod my head in agreement.
item.content:encoded:
EQ2 has kept me entertained for the last couple of months. Being a hardcore EQ player back in the day(starting in December 1999), I was rather shocked at how much easier EQ2 was over EQ.

I hope you enjoy your time in EQ2land. If not, I hope you rip EQ2 to hell and gone so I can read about it and nod my head in agreement.

item.title: By: Ethic
item.dc:creator: Ethic
item.description: There's one thing you've got to learn is not to be afraid of it.
item.content:encoded: There’s one thing you’ve got to learn is not to be afraid of it.
